title: 1 in 3 car buyers in South India likely to buy an electric vehicle, claims survey
description: A Way2News survey among 400,000 respondents across five South Indian states finds growing interest in electric vehicles (EVs), with 31% inclined to buy an EV and 65% prioritizing eco-friendly choices. Safety features and SUVs are top considerations, and digital platforms play a key role in car-buying decisions.
